other_tests.procedure_name: Genetic analysis of the RET protooncogene
other_tests.findings: Mutation found at exon 15, codon 891, TCG mutated to GCG resulting in a serine to alanine amino acid change.

other_tests.procedure_name: Total thyroidectomy with radical left neck dissection
other_tests.findings: Histopathology revealed a 1-mm focus of medullary thyroid carcinoma (MTC) with multifocal C cell hyperplasia in a background of Hashimotoâ€™s thyroiditis. Seventeen lymph nodes were negative for tumor.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Calcitonin values remained normal with no evidence of pheochromocytoma or hyperparathyroidism after 1 year of follow-up.
